testcase.classname: To validate the functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: To validate all the fields in the Place Order Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to place order page......................................passed And User click the edit cart link...........................................passed And User click the edit button in payment and billing address fields........passed Then User redirected to billing page to edit the payment and billing address.passed
